mapper.insert: insert into keyword (keyword_id, keyword_content, moviemap_flag, resourcelist_flag) values (#{keywordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keywordContent,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{moviemapFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resourcelistFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select keyword_id, keyword_content, moviemap_flag, resourcelist_flag from keyword
